result.eng: Life was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ga: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.orig: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againn
result.html: bhí an saol difriúil ag an am sa mhéid nach raibh áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.
result.ponchtml: ḃí an saol difriúil ag an am sa ṁéid naċ raiḃ áiseanna na linne seo againnLife was different then in the sense that we didn't have modern-day facilities.

result.eng: I didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ga: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.orig: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeacht
result.html: bhí mé idir dhá chomhairle ar chóir dom fanacht nó imeachtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.
result.ponchtml: ḃí mé idir ḋá ċoṁairle ar ċóir dom fanaċt nó imeaċtI didn't know whether I should stay or go.

result.eng: He asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ga: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.orig: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dó
result.html: chuir sé ceist orm ach níor thug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.
result.ponchtml: ċuir sé ceist orm aċ níor ṫug mé freagra dóHe asked me a question but I didn't answer him.

result.eng: I didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ga: ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.orig: ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibre
result.html: ní bhfuair mé aitheantas as mo chuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair mé aiṫeantas as mo ċuid oibreI didn't get recognition for my work.

result.eng: I didn't get anything.
result.ga: ní bhfuair mé faic
result.orig: ní bhfuair mé faic
result.html: ní bhfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair mé faicI didn't get anything.

result.eng: She didn't do anything.
result.ga: ní dhearna sí tada
result.orig: ní dhearna sí tada
result.html: ní dhearna sí tadaShe didn't do anything.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋearna sí tadaShe didn't do anything.

result.eng: She didn't take anything for granted.

result.orig: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bith
result.html: ní dhearna sí talamh slán de rud ar bithShe didn't take anything for granted.
result.ponchtml: ní ḋearna sí talaṁ slán de rud ar biṫShe didn't take anything for granted.

result.eng: I didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.orig: ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháil
result.html: ní raibh seans agam foghlaim a fháilI didn't have a chance to get an education.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ seans agam foġlaim a ḟáilI didn't have a chance to get an education.

result.eng: I didn't receive the e-mail, even though I have registered.

result.orig: ní bhfuair mé an ríomhphost tar éis gur chláraigh mé

result.eng: He didn't even have a driver's licence.
result.ga: ní raibh teastas tiomána aige fiú

result.html: ní raibh teastas tiomána aige fiúHe didn't even have a driver's licence.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ teastas tiomána aige fiúHe didn't even have a driver's licence.

result.eng: I didn't sleep much.
result.ga: níor chodail mé mórán

result.html: níor chodail mé móránI didn't sleep much.
result.ponchtml: níor ċodail mé móránI didn't sleep much.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.

result.orig: níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach

result.eng: I didn't hear that at all.

result.html: níor chuala mé é sin in aon chorI didn't hear that at all.
result.ponchtml: níor ċuala mé é sin in aon ċorI didn't hear that at all.

result.eng: I didn't attend the first event.

result.eng: I didn't pay much attention to it.
result.ga: níor thug mé mórán airde air

result.orig: níor thuig mé gach focal ach thuig mé éirim na cainte

result.html: níor éirigh liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.
result.ponchtml: níor éiriġ liom sa scrúdúI didn't succeed in the exam.

result.eng: He didn't pay the fee.
result.ga: níor íoc sé an táille
result.orig: níor íoc sé an táille
result.html: níor íoc sé an táilleHe didn't pay the fee.
result.ponchtml: níor íoc sé an táilleHe didn't pay the fee.

result.html: seo duine de na daoine nár íoc an táilleThis one of the people who didn't pay the fee.

result.html: tuige nár íoc tú an táilleWhy didn't you pay the fee?

result.eng: I hope you didn't steal all the money.
result.ga: tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir
result.orig: tá súil agam nár ghoid tú an t-airgead sin go léir

result.ponchtml: tá súil agam nár ġoid tú an t-airgead sin go léirI hope you didn't steal all the money.

result.eng: I didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.
result.ga: níor chas ach tá neart daoine as cois fharraige fós ann
result.orig: níor chas ach tá neart daoine as cois fharraige fós ann

result.eng: It was nice and dry. {It didn't rain.}
result.ga: bhí sé breá tirim
result.orig: bhí sé breá tirim
result.html: bhí sé breá tirimIt was nice and dry. {It didn't rain.}
result.ponchtml: ḃí sé breá tirimIt was nice and dry. {It didn't rain.}

result.eng: She didn't like the look of us.
result.ga: níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.orig: níor thaitin ár ndreach léi
result.html: níor thaitin ár ndreach léiShe didn't like the look of us.
result.ponchtml: níor ṫaitin ár ndreaċ léiShe didn't like the look of us.

result.eng: I have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.
result.ga: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.orig: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéile
result.html: níl aon údar agamsa lena cheapadh nach raibh aithne acu ar a chéileI have no reason to believe they didn't know each other.

result.eng: Although we didn't fall out completely, the friendship cooled off.
result.ga: cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas
result.orig: cé nár thiteamar amach le chéile ar fad tháinig fuacht ar an gcairdeas

result.eng: For some reason I was afraid of the dead dogs even though they didn't even move.
result.ga: ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu
result.orig: ar chúis éigin bhí eagla orm roimh na madraí marbha cé nach raibh cor astu

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na meiriceánach dúchasach

result.eng: As we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.
result.ga: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn

result.ponchtml: mar is eol dúinn anois níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainnAs we know now, the Nazis didn't stop with Poland.

result.eng: And in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ga: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.orig: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháin
result.html: agus le cois sin dá mba bhuama é cén fáth nár pléascadh gach taobh seachas an dá thaobh amháinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?
result.ponchtml: agus le cois sin dá mba ḃuama é cén fáṫ nár pléascaḋ gaċ taoḃ seaċas an dá ṫaoḃ aṁáinAnd in addition to that, if it was a bomb, why didn't all sides explode, instead of just the two sides?

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh

result.eng: The Nazis didn't stop with Poland  and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ga: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.orig: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maith
result.html: níor stop na naitsithe leis an bpolainn agus níorbh fhada go raibh an fhrainc ina seilbh acu chomh maithThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.
result.ponchtml: níor stop na naitsiṫe leis an bpolainn agus níorḃ ḟada go raiḃ an ḟrainc ina seilḃ acu ċoṁ maiṫThe Nazis didn't stop with Poland and it wasn't long until they had France in their possession as well.

result.eng: Laughing even though she didn't want to.

result.eng: You will get something you didn't bargain for!

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: Pursuing a woman who didn't fancy him.

result.eng: But he did not resist. {He obliged a request even though he didn't want to.}

result.eng: Fear didn't allow Jamie to refuse doing it.

result.eng: He didn't really want to steal.
